resources.string: Medications
Medication you are currently taking or have taken in the past, dose and date of prescribed medication.
Allergies and Intolerances

Includes clinical assessment of an allergy or intolerance; a propensity, or a potential risk to an individual, to have an adverse reaction on future exposure to the specified substance, or class of substance
Problems
Information about a condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern
Immunizations
Details of vaccines administered and time of administration.
Surgical interventions
Information on procedures performed. Examples are surgical procedures, endoscopic procedures or biopsies.
Medical implants
Medical implants, such as artificial hip joints or pacemakers.
Vital signs
Vital signs, such as recorded height, weight history or heart rate.
Laboratory results
Examination results obtained by blood or other laboratory tests.
Fitness data
Fitness and exercise data collected e.g. via sports watches and other wearables on the body.
Questionnaire
Questionnaires or medical history forms that you have collected in connection with your health.
